title: The Beginning
content: Master Gauri & Master Refilwe wish to create a universe that does not resist change. They were not always fearless of the transformation of death. Before they were Masters they held much different views.

title: The Meeting
content: They met dancing at a festival of colourjoy, after Refilwe had lost someone close to them.

title: The Change
content: The first time Gauri saw change in its most infinitesimal, they were dancing solo, it felt like a rainbow.

title: The Fear
content: Refilewe had a strong fear of change. Rainbows were not the same for them.

title: Partners
content: Gauri proposed they become partners and meld their rainbows. It was this great transformation that took them on their journey to become the eventual Masters we see today.

title: Bad News
content: A few months ago, the chief of My fellow Brutus was diagnosed with a rare disease Lot#1430A.

title: A New Hope
content: The chief is getting weaker day by day. While the death of the chief is coming slowly, Brutus hopes to win the dance marathon and bring the chief back to life in the next universe.

title: The Past
content: Formation 16 knows a Lye healer. They used to be the best of friends.

title: If you loved me…
content: After the Lye abandoned Brutus, Formation 17 convinced Formation 16 that it wasn't safe to continue their friendship.

title: Misgivings
content: Formation 17 worries that if they bring back the chief of My fellow Brutus, they will cast the Lye into the void.

title: Free Movement
content: Popper and Piper have been running for a long time. They are experts at passing through boundaries.

title: Isolation
content: It is hard to exist in inbetween places where no one wants to join them or attempt to understand.

title: A Dream
content: If they won DIGIDAMARA, they want to create a place that is safe. Safety is…

title: Foundation
content: The familiar. Familiar needs to be built. Nothing is value...yet.

title: The Silence
content: Everyone knows why Popper and Piper are the last, but everyone is afraid to say it, otherwise they may be the last too.

title: The Mountain
content: Grunter is tired of being seen as one thing.

title: The Pressure
content: Some of his family clusters want Grunter to be eternally strong, and this is part of why he ran away on the Soul Train.

title: My insides
content: Grunter tries to hide it, but the great hunger inside him never stops.

title: Some are proud
content: His grandcluster is proud of him, and has held Collective Smash parties in his honour since he started dancing.

title: Break the cycle
content: Grunter believes if he wins, the Sglunkus Snorfluxii will find a way to satisfy this eternal hunger.

title: Be a Star
content: Babe and Bas have secretly always wanted to be famous. If they are always loved, their chance of perishing is limited.

title: The Fight
content: Once Babe made a game that Bas could not play. It was their first great fight.

title: Forgiveness
content: It took them only .23 seconds to forgive each other. Eeeksum find great strength in uniting at all costs.

title: The Enemy
content: For them, Sglunkus Snorfluxii are giant vacuum cleaners who take over all they see.

title: Stand Together
content: If they win DIGIDAMARA, they are excited about how their unity will transform them and others.

title: Goodbye Water
content: Not many know, but the oceanic homeland of the Mandulae is drying up.

title: Knowledge is all
content: Entheroll and Auram have come to DIGIDAMARA so the wealth of knowledge that the Mandulae have gained will be taken into the next universe.

title: The Greatest Thread
content: If they fail, they will return to the ultimate beauty of the darkness.

title: Doubt
content: Auram is not sure if the darkness is the most beautiful anymore. Their curiosity leads them.

title: Sacrifice
content: Entheroll has offered Auram a gift that may save them despite who wins.
